website_summaries.verdict: Rest easy knowing this beautiful lip gloss is cruelty-free.
pros: Pigmented colors have a high-gloss finish without feeling overly sticky
Glides on smoothly, easy to apply
Has a sweet scent in the tube that fades away on your lips
cons: Some of the glittery shades feel slightly gritty when applying

customer_reviews.title: Very cute/ worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The melted toffee is cute and is a calmed down version of honeyed kiss. Honeyed kiss is very frosty with silver reflect, perfect lip topper or as an act alone lip gloss. And Give me guava is a gold reflect and is a great lip topper as well. The smell of the lip glosses are pleasing. The feel is not sticky and feels very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: CherryTomato

customer_reviews.title: I've been purchasing this lip gloss for 7+ years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing this lip gloss for 7+ years. I bought it on Amazon since it was a value 3 pack. However, this product is NOT made by Covergirl. This is a chunky glittery lip gloss with a chemical smell that burned my lips. I'm pissed that I missed my return window. I don't know why Amazon allows brands to sell an item under a brand name, when it's clearly not that brand. THIS IS NOT COVERGIRL. The applicators on this gloss are also cheap, hard plastic; not the traditional doe foot. COMPLETE JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and non sticky.
customer_reviews.text: I love lip gloss but it's always hard to shop for one online without trying it. My biggest problems with most lip glosses is that they are sticky. This lip gloss is not sticky and it's beautiful on its own or as a topper to give you that extra shine. The reason why it's only 4 stars is because it is a litte but gritty and it's because there are fine-milled specks of glitter in it to really make is sparkly in the sun. I like my lips extra smooth. I still use this often. Good lip gloss otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Y

customer_reviews.title: So glad to find these, and on a subscription, so I'll never run out again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a classy, subtle color for lips that goes with everything. I stopped finding it at my local drugstore, and I'm so glad I found it here, and on subscription! Now, I'll never run out or waste time going from store to store looking for it! I buy these by the handful, and keep them in my purse, in the car, and at my makeup mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Moon Farm

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite and affordable lipglosses
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss in “Honeyed Kiss” is one of my all time favorite drugstore glosses. It goes on very smoothly, is a gorgeous pinkish/nude color, has a lot of shine, and not to mention it is moisturizing and smells AMAZING. The only downfall I had with ordering it off of amazon was the fact that it came not sealed. Cosmetics (especially lipglosses), should ALWAYS be sealed properly for sanitation reasons. Other than that, I’m satisfied... :-)
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: The only lip gloss I will buy.
customer_reviews.text: This, by far, is my favorite lip gloss and you can't beat the price. I've bought too many lip glosses that end up thrown out (don't get me started on L'Oreal's Infalliable...yuck). The color you see is the color on your lips. It's soft, not sticky...and no weird taste or smell (unlike Lancome).
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but gritty
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really pretty color - peachy pink with gold shimmer in it. Unfortunately, it’s not very shiny/glossy and it’s very sheer so it barely shows up (on my lips, anyway). Still it works as a nice nude lip or lip topper. It has a nice sweet scent. But the one thing I really don’t like is that you can feel the glitter particles in the formula so it feels gritty when you rub your lips together.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: which I love, where I first bought this lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I couldnt find this color again, which I love, where I first bought this lip gloss. Its the perfect shade of pale pink for me. Did they discontinue it, or the store decided not to reorder ?? Who knows!! So I was VERY HAPPY to find it here on Amazon! THANK YOU !! THANK YOU !!
customer_reviews.author: Irene O.

customer_reviews.title: Shimmery, sheer (not beige) lip gloss.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a decent lip gloss. It's more of a sheer color than a nude or beige color. I have light colored lips and this was a clear, shimmery gloss. If you like a bit of color, I would go with a darker shade. Looks very subtle and shimmery on the lips. Would buy again. It's a decent sized tube. It lasts for at least 4 hours with only one application. It is not sticky. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great gloss.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite gloss, alone or over a lipstick that needs a little shine and moisture. I am so happy I found it on Amazon because I haven’t been able to find it in stores and I have guarded this empty container with my life trying to do so. It doesn’t take more then one application to get all the shine and moisture I want and it’s not sticky like some lipgloss, every time the wind blows your hair gets stuck to your lips, not a good look ;-) so back to the tried and true Covergirl it is.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Goes on nice and smooth and is not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Goes on nice and smooth and is not sticky. I like this colored lip gloss a lot, but was kind of disappointed with the color. It was much lighter then what it looked like online. I was hoping for it to be more pink, but instead it was much more of a natural shade that didn’t give much color.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B

customer_reviews.title: Craving Cranberries
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craving cranberries color was most suitable to my tanned brown skin color. It lasts for hours and keeps my lips well moistened.
customer_reviews.author: Ddee

customer_reviews.title: Love this gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I was every bit as sad when CoverGirl discontinued their Crystal Wetslicks. I have been searching for a dupe and always ended up with thick and goopy. This product has the same scent, I liken to marshmallow. Still, not the same as Wetslicks from several years ago, but it's nice. It would look great over a nude lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Clare Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Shade not as pictured, does not last long
customer_reviews.text: It goes on so, so thinly and doesn't stay on for long. I purchased the shade "Berrylicious" and the color is much paler in person. It's basically a nude shade. (I stirred in a bit of a true berry lipstick to it to make it more exciting). It's *okay* as a backup, but I definitely won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: Color Choices are NOT accurate!
customer_reviews.text: The Color I ordered matches my previous lip gloss by Name & #, but it does not match the actual color of the tube I was replacing which is my Favorite Color of this product. This was a major disappointment because this product is no longer available in stores near me.
customer_reviews.author: Alaine

customer_reviews.title: Too glittery
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is 'Kid Stuff' glittery and shiny; however, I like the consistency so I will wear it as a bedtime lip balm. I appreciate it Not smelling like chemicals but it has a Powerful Vanilla/Coffee scent that is way too strong.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it not knowing if it was going to be heavy on my lips like other lip glosses,but this one wasn't . The light pink color is the one i got , i'ts a nice light color i'ts perfect not heavy and very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I disliked this lip gloss I wore it for about 3 day and ended up with a huge blister on my lip. If I am being honest it could be me or the lip gloss I am not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a non sticky lip gloss that still has the glittery shine and this lipgloss does the trick. For the price of $3 it’s definitely a great deal and is better quality than lipglosses I have bought that cost $12. I will be ordering more :)
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with this lipstick. It's the perfect color for my skin tone. I've been having a hard time finding like a clear color type of lipstick and this is the one. I order them every chance i get. I don't want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, like coconut!
customer_reviews.text: I like a little light shimmer on my lips, especially over a medium-toned lipstick. This does the job, and smells of light coconut. Very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lexicron

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shade and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It was as I expected, just slightly more sheer. I absolutely LOVE this lip gloss! It's a beautiful, light shade and goes on smooth. It's not super sticky, nor does it have gritty glittery like a lot of glosses do.
customer_reviews.author: Angelamarie Barry

customer_reviews.title: Love this = perfect lighter pink color
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip gloss. It does come off - as all glosses do, but the color is great and does not stick your lips together.
customer_reviews.author: J Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty....
customer_reviews.text: A subtle & natural looking gloss. Not overly shimmery like some. Looks great alone or over lipstick. In love with the scent. Not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Railyne Aellea

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful and stays on!
customer_reviews.text: Tastes delicious and is thick enough to stay on doesn’t feel like lipstick does, more like chap stick and the color is beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa teague

customer_reviews.title: Simple Shimmer
customer_reviews.text: On a hot summer day when you just want to add a little shimmer this is perfect! It will become your go-to item. Beautiful shine, not too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: SO glad I can find this gloss on Amazon, cause they quit selling it in stores. I love it, and have several subscriptions with different colors/flavors.
customer_reviews.author: LSant1986

customer_reviews.title: Good lipgloss !
customer_reviews.text: The gloss and color are really pretty, I’m extremely happy with my purchase and will but again, not really a moisturizer or supposed to have a scent that’s why ratings are effected.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, non sticky gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss, it's not sticky and has a little color. I'll be purchasing other colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This gloss tastes gross. It us greasy and streaky. It does not last but a few minutes and transfers. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: TkY

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Colors are not true!
customer_reviews.text: Color is not correct. I have used the same color, 640 Juicy Fruit, for over 5 years. The color stickers say 640, Juicy Fruit, but the tubes do not contain that color. Actually, I bought two 640s and they don’t even match each other. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: J M Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy product... doesnt stay on and just feels gross on your lips. I threw product away
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Gloss
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lip-gloss! I originally bought it to wear to a Denver Broncos game since it was an orange color, but it looks so pretty on the lip that I wear it all of the time!! A nice high gloss finish with great color. Only downside is that you need to reapply a lot but that is to be expected from a gloss with this high of shine. I love it and will buy more when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin_Gal37

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! Can't wait to wear it all summer. Just for reference im very pale (usually the lightest color available in foundation, even then some are too dark) with a cool undertone
customer_reviews.author: kaylin hernandez

customer_reviews.title: The best lip gloss...Covergirl do not discontinue this!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip gloss and I seriously hope covergirl doesn’t discontinue it!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GLOSS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss. Its a nice and natural shimmer. It works as a good base color, my other lip gloss has a nice color to it but its tacky, so I just apply it over this one.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Santana

customer_reviews.title: It’s non sticky!!
customer_reviews.text: I get a lot of compliments with this gloss. It’s non sticky, taste good, great color, and last. Long time.
customer_reviews.author: gracious

customer_reviews.title: So soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Been hooked on this for 5+ years. Not deep color but reapply often (like moisturizer chapstick) and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine S.

customer_reviews.title: didnt care for the color
customer_reviews.text: did not care for the color but other than that it is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so smooth, feels great on your lips, and even has a nice scent. The color is also divine.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Law

customer_reviews.title: Color # the same but kind of orange.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss and Wal-mart stopped carrying it. When I received it from Amazon it was the same color number but the color looks totally different. It is kind of orangish pink and super sparkly. Canceling my auto subscription.
customer_reviews.author: S. Vand

customer_reviews.title: Decent lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Like the way this feels and the color is a nice neutral! Not too sticky and has some staying power!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Sasfai

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gloss shade!
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is the perfect summer shade...it's my go to color for a quick lip shine when I don't want to wear full makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Melisse P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find this particular gloss in many stores and they were out. Ordered through Amazon and got just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Jules75

customer_reviews.title: Great gloss
customer_reviews.text: I always use this for my gloss. I couldn't find it at the store so I purchased from Amazon. The color is light and that's what I like.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Scudiero

customer_reviews.title: Ok lippie
customer_reviews.text: An ok lip gloss. My god-daughter is finally allowed to wear some makeup and she thought the lip gloss was just ok.
customer_reviews.author: NJ-WA Poetess

customer_reviews.title: Not the original
customer_reviews.text: Bad color, strong smell, not the same product I have previously purchased at the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Diana B

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy this gloss at the drugstore and can’t find it there anymore. Was happy to find it here! Especially this color. I love the sheer coverage and the feel of this gloss. One of my faves!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely color and gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect dupe for Fenty Gloss Bomb. Soft peach color and really nice gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen F.

customer_reviews.title: best gloss
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and perfect condition. Love love this gloss. Smooth creamy and stays on. Glad I could find this product.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Bricknell

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Lip Gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, consistently and great moisturizing quality! It works better for me than chap stick or other products, and looks great, too. I don't want to be without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very glossy and nice my husband loves this on me!
customer_reviews.author: Reynalda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Ilike the color of tjis Lip Glos So light and soft looking
customer_reviews.author: marylene

customer_reviews.title: Good color
customer_reviews.text: It was a good choice for me. Not too much color, but that’s what I wanted. A little sticky going on. I usually put lip balm on before I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Luke

customer_reviews.title: Great Beauty Product
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and consistency of this gloss. It is my "every day" go to beauty product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Pringle

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this was one of my favorite lip glosses until my sister lost it lol but i would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Camargo

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip gloss in the world
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip gloss in the world. The color is perfect nude shine and it doesn’t feel like your wearing sticky lipgloss at all. I can’t find this color in stores anymore it’s always sold out so I ordered it on here.. it came in and I got 2 lipglosses. I wasn’t only expecting one! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lipgloss! Such a great deal. Very moisturizing and long lasting. It’s a nice subtle color. My only complaint is I wish it wasn’t unscented. Just a preference. I just like the fruity pleasant scents.
customer_reviews.author: S. Day

customer_reviews.title: wrong shade
customer_reviews.text: Not correct color. It is labeled as 'Juicy Fruit', but has come as an orange/red shade. I have exchanged it and the same thing happened. Each one is a different shade. I cannot find how to ask for another replacement or return these items.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturizing , long lasting and I love how it smells ! And has no taste at all which I like . Def would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Its ok..
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't give you the full color I was looking for..
customer_reviews.author: MzRenni💖

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this specific color, Juicy Fruit, for years from local stores. It is a very light pink. When I received my order from Amazon it was orange. Not the color that Covergirl puts out, but it had the Covergirl name on it.
customer_reviews.author: George Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Too purple for me
customer_reviews.text: More on the purple side than I preferred so I gave them as gifts. The receivers were happy with the color so it all worked out
customer_reviews.author: Katscrx

customer_reviews.title: It's sheer, with light shimmer (nothing tacky, when ...
customer_reviews.text: It's sheer, with light shimmer (nothing tacky, when applied not too glittery), and very moisturizing. I often end up using this instead of a lip balm.
customer_reviews.author: arrapa

customer_reviews.title: nice nude color
customer_reviews.text: you can wear this alone or layer it over another color to soften..the price is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shade marked on product and delivered
customer_reviews.text: Although I love the lip product, it was delivered as being the color " juicy fruit #640" as ordered. It is NOT THAT SHADE! I won't go to the trouble to return as it is not costly. However , it is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: All of them look good with our pale skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these in 3 different colors for my daughter and I. All of them look good with our pale skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty K

customer_reviews.title: Love the color of this lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for continuing to make this product and this color lip gloss! It is hard to find in the stores and therefore, I'm thankful to find it online!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Kimball

customer_reviews.title: and still love
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for years, and still love it
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted and it is not sticky or feel cheap. Doesn't have extremely high shine or glitter very moderate.
customer_reviews.author: Mary from Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, smell and the way it looks on me! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soothing
customer_reviews.text: This Covergirl lip gloss is one of just a few things I can use on my lips that actually helps my Burning Mouth Syndrome!!! It’s very soothing and looks good too😉
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: My new Go-To
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gloss, wish the tint was tad bit darker, but I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color— not a juicy fruit—  total disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original cover girl juicy fruit. It is due a blond ie redhead but entirely different than the Juicy Fruit I was looking for. I would give it less than One star but the algorithm won’t let me
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth K McCloy

customer_reviews.title: Good neutral
customer_reviews.text: A little sparkly that I wasn’t expecting. Pretty thick too. It’s good to tone down a dark lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Color and great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of this lip gloss and love that it's not sticky!
customer_reviews.author: KelleyH

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but order not complete
customer_reviews.text: Love this CoverGirl LipGloss. Very happy with the product. Unfortunately, my complete order was not shipped. This has never happened from Amazon. Ordered 6, only 5 were delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Claire H

customer_reviews.title: Highly Reccomend For Everyday Use!
customer_reviews.text: Phenominal! I got two and they are amazing for every day use. They smell amazing and it’s the perfect amount of shine, without it being too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Mika

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the shade I expected. Forever to remain in my Lipstick Drawer. hee-hee
customer_reviews.author: Donna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Remove me from the auto send every month!!! I don’t like this product. Thank you..
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like this product. This is my third time telling this. Please stop sending this product!!
customer_reviews.author: apiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the color I was hoping for but it’s still a nice lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Logan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: made my lips extremely dry every time applied. Unfortunate, I had high hopes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Klorman

customer_reviews.title: have always loved this gloss and always will
customer_reviews.text: have always loved this gloss and always will. I need to apply, then re-apply once an hour, however. Talk, and drink coffee all the time which is why I have to re-apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Too cute color!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the consistency. Very natural looking color and perfect amount of gloss.
customer_reviews.author: MommyMary

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I love this color and I feel like it is a good value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: quilter6997

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Far lighter than I expected. It's a pleasant enough tone, but not very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm so sold on this - others have bought it on my recommendation
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this item again and the color is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: one star for quick delivery but the color is lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Wendolyn

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite lip gloss and it's not easy find in stores. Ordered 5!
customer_reviews.author: Kanders

customer_reviews.title: Looks used! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The product was scratched all the way! Like it was used before, not worth paying for it
customer_reviews.author: Tiny

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lip gloss for years. Hard to find anywhere else!
customer_reviews.author: B Swift

customer_reviews.title: I need a refund
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really like it I thought I got a fake gloss, very streaky and looks ugly on the lips not evenly applied. It's also doing something weird which is peeling off my lips like a lip scrub, I thought I would like it but unfortunately I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Batool Altaher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude
customer_reviews.text: Very sheer for days you don’t want a lot of color. Very pretty and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Logan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this color and the gloss stays on for hours.
customer_reviews.author: DAX

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: It’s feels smooth and light , almost like your wearing nothing on .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item was used
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived used. Without a doubt used and all gone. Not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Covers easy, does not leave a goopy sticky mess. This is my second stick of this line.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: All of them look good with our pale skin tone
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these in 3 different colors for my daughter and I. All of them look good with our pale skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty K

customer_reviews.title: A favorite lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I use this over lipstick for extra gloss. Pretty color. I've bought this several times
customer_reviews.author: PaulaShan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product was not in the box. Please send another.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Essig

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Colorlicious Gloss Berrylicious 710, .12 oz (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description:
Color:Berrylicious| Size:1 CountShades that never lie. 13 luscious glosses with true to the tube shades. What you see is what you get!

BRAND STORY
By CoverGirl
feature_bullets: High gloss meets high impact color
Colorlicious combination of color, gloss and lip conditioners
Moisturizing formula without all that stickiness

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
